message.body: So I was reading more on hogdkins and the thing I said about shortened life expectancy is not true thankfully. Did Kev text you saying she is still gonna go to his house warming party?
Nah kev is ur bul. Liz wont let anything keep her from a party lol
Haha. Trueeee. Well Kev is making a big banner for her that's gonna say "fuck cancer" and were all gonna sign it with well wishes and shit
Damn. I didnt even know they were friends
Yeah I was thinking how did that conversation go? Was Kev like "hey Liz I know you have cancer and all but are you still coming to my house warming party?" Haha
Are you gonna go? It's not this Saturday but the next...
I dunno. Not sure how i feel bout kev Turner. Plus Agata will be here and i dun really kno if i was invited
What do you mean? How do you feel about Kev? Is it cause you hooked up with his ex?
Lol. I think he bears some type of grudge against me cuz of that but he wasnt her bf at the time. Hes just hard to read. How do u even kno bout that?
You told me about it... I would be happy if you came and brought agata, I wanna hang out with her for real this time!
Oh lol. I dun wanna just show up at his crib. He said it was vip only on fb lol i dunno im leanin more towards no. But ill see wassup on sat i guess
